name: Fudō Master - An Idle Game with a Rock - Paper - Scissor Combat
name_original: Fudō Master - An Idle Game with a Rock - Paper - Scissor Combat
description:
This game is a student project and a Proof of concept.

Game Concept for an Incremental Game around a Ronin with a Rock-Paper_Scissor like fight system and a minimalist   pixel art style.
This Game was design with mobile in mind, although, for presentation porpoise, this build was made for Windows PC. 

Input and suggestions are welcome to turn this into a complete game (beside the clear point where it's incomplete). 

Developed in 2 months in the context of a Game Development Course in World Academy, Lisbon.
